articles.description: “If we are chosen as host city there’s no question Eurovision will take over Liverpool in a way no single event has ever done before"
articles.content:
Liverpool is tantalisingly close to being named the next city to host the Eurovision Song Contest.
The city is down to the final two in the race to host the showpiece event next year, with only Glas… [+5630 chars]

articles.author: Jack Walters
articles.title: 'Extreme!': Reason why Queen's cause of death differed from Queen Mother's laid bare - Express
articles.description: Queen Elizabeth II passed away at the age of 96 on September 8, 20 years after the Queen Mother died at the age of 101.

articles.title: Brooklyn Beckham and wife Nicola Peltz match in black suits for Givenchy's PFW show - Daily Mail
articles.description: Brooklyn Beckham, 23, and wife Nicola Peltz, 27, looked chic in matching outfits as they stepped out to Givenchy's Spring/Summer 2023 Paris Fashion Week show on Sunday.
articles.content:
